title: Upton's choice puzzles weather watchers
body: It appears that Justin Upton would prefer to spend his summers in Phoenix rather than Seattle.  It's Upton's life. It's Upton's career. It's Upton's choice. But those of us who have been in both Phoenix and Seattle in the summer are allowed a raised eyebrow. Or two.  According to reliable reports, Upton rejected a proposed trade that would have taken him from the Arizona Diamondbacks to the Seattle Mariners. The Mariners have been seeking an impact bat, and they have some prime pitching prospects who make them attractive trading partners. Mike Bauman is a national columnist for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Mike Bauman
